FlavorText 5: Anyone with a sword can do something
Just be glad he can hit things
Incredible that your guild attracts people who can read
Years of training make the masters of blade, bow and tome alike
They move swiftly thyough unnatural shadows
The bastion of a good team
Sacrifice has turned him into a killing machine

AbilityText 4: Assassin has a 50% chance to recive no damage
